title: FURNISHED 1 bed/1bath 900 Sqft - by OWNER
app_fee: $40 per person, includes background and credit check
posting_body: FURNISHED 1 bedroom, 1 bath condo available for rent in the galleria area.
This condo comes with 1 covered parking space inside a gated area.
Plenty of guest parking is close by.
Walking distance from HEB grocery store.
The property is located north of Westheimer road which is the safer and nicer side.
- 900 sqft condo in a gated, quiet and safe community
- 1 covered parking spot reserved, inside gated area
- furnished with queen bed, dresser, mirror, sectional sofa, flat screen tv, pots and pans, utensils, knives, dishes, toaster oven, dish washer, microwave, table, upholstered chairs, ottoman, etc
- quiet and safe property, it's gated, you have great neighbors
- new extra large front load washer and dryer included

- centrally located condo; 15 min drive to downtown, 15 minutes to medical center, less than 5 min drive to galleria mall, walking distance from HEB grocery store, walking  distance from many restaurants
- 2nd story so you will not hear any foot steps above you.
My wife and I lived there for about 6 years without any issues.
Most of the neighbors are actually owners so it's nice, quiet, and well taken care of.
We moved to a house but we loved the place so we decided to keep it and rent it out.
Call me if you have any questions.
- security deposit is 1 month rent (roughly $1400) with good credit, more if not so good credit
- $40 application fee per person (background and credit check)
